Find Domain Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System (Windows)

Select Domain»Find Domain in the Domain Account Manager to display this dialog box. You also can right-click the network domain list and select Find Domain from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to find network domains to add to the network domain list.

This dialog box includes the following component:

  • Name or IP address of host machine—Specifies the name or IP address of the network domain you want to find.
